---
applyTo: "docs/processes/**/*.md"
---
# Process authoring rules

- Every process must have a process.md with: Purpose, When to use, Preconditions, Steps, Quality gates, Output format.
- Steps must be numbered NN-<name>.md and written as imperative instructions.
- Outputs must have an outputs/output-contract.md describing required deliverables.
- Update docs/processes/_registry.md when adding/changing process IDs.
